name: TDS MODERN Heartbeast GameJam
description:
If you like the game, please donate and I will greatly Expand this game!

Not only do I have Upgrades like A rifle, machine gun, flame thrower and grenade launcher! 

 I also have Tanks, Helicopters, Bombers, Panzer's, BTR's and much much more

to be either used by the player or as enemies!!

I can not spend time on this unless I have some means of support! So, please again, if you like this game, please donate! Anything helps a one man coding Band! Lol!

Enjoy!
